cause.description:
Namibia's 2007 annual baby seal cull (due to start on July 1), the second largest Seal Slaughter in the world (by three sealing concessionaires) - Seal Alert-SA raises some serious questions that need answering by the Namibian Fisheries Ministry.
Namibia now remains the only country on earth to round up nursing baby seals still suckling on their mother's milk, driving them in-land away from the safety of the sea, and as they attempt to flee alongside their mothers back to its safety are clubbed and stabbed to death by rows of as many as 100 part-time migrant workers - everyday between July 1 and November 15, each year. Vomiting up their mother's milk as they slowly die...
To sign the petition(s) against the killings in Namibia you need to read this: http://www.sealalert.org/news_en.htm and then sign this: http://www.petitiononline.com/STASH06/petition-sign.html? http://www.petitiononline.com/Rrancois/petition.html http://www.petitiononline.com/RobbenSA/
While Facebook Causes only support US beneficiaries please visit: http://www.sealalert.org/support_seal-alert_en.htm
if you want to make a donation.
1. The Cape fur seals are today 5 - 10 percent of their former population.
2. Described as the cruellest seal hunt on earth.
3. For the Seals, voice your international right to a protected marine environment
